data.text: @keithboykin @chancetherapper Just have to be smarter about the shit. Vote how you want but do your research and know what you're talking about. Stop just jumping on Bandwagons. @chancetherapper you have a huge platform and many followers, be responsible with your words please.

@keithboykin Stop , look and listen 
Look both ways before you cross the street.

Supporting FAKE45 will get you drugg on twitter 

                      #goldenrules

@keithboykin Thankfully that party already exists -----> @GreenPartyUS.

I encourage both @kanyewest & @chancetherapper to get involved!

#VoteGreen #RegisterGreen #RunGreen

https://t.co/f9OlYNhdWf
@CourtneyMcCain @keithboykin Hell no!

@keithboykin Chance the Rapper’s statement is an opinion which he is entitled to. Why is it controversial? I’m waiting for him to take his argument further with alternatives and supporting evidence. My 10 yr old nephew gives his opinion constantly.
@keithboykin Now the conservatives are like, "WTF"?? I thought he was with us!!

@keithboykin Yeah, Chance is right about all blacks don't have to be Democrats but don't step and disparage my people and community to show your pledge is true. That's when I'm gonna speak up. Got ideas, let's work on it together. Otherwise, steppin fetch your ass on.
@keithboykin I hope they don’t use the Democratic Party model. My god every thing  and every city dems control is crime ridden, bankrupt, and corrupt!!! Prove me wrong race baiter!!!
@keithboykin While I appreciate the apology this is a grown ass man. He could have checked the context BEFORE he sent that original tweet.
@keithboykin Don’t you just love cowards? Can’t think for themselves. #democrats

@keithboykin @chancetherapper
“Look! I am sending you out as sheep among wolves; so prove yourselves cautious as serpents and yet innocent as doves. -Jesus https://t.co/m8c7bqVH74
@Bluerose4875 @keithboykin He or his publicist finally gets it .
@DelilahBenson12 @keithboykin Let’s see how many Trump supporters by his music age old adage says “ Don’t bite the hand that feeds you “
@keithboykin  https://t.co/06fHguzcsg
@keithboykin Gotta love Chance. He always speaks the truth.
@keithboykin Exactly; walk the talk, don’t just think about yourself. Can they? Or, is it just about record sales?
@keithboykin With money and support one should be able to do both simultaneously (like the last 3rd party that mattered, the GOP).
@keithboykin So he was motivated by a dip in popularity?

And finally, if Kanye or Chance or anyone wants to create or support a third party, the way to do that is from the bottom up, by electing people to school boards, city councils and state legislatures, not to elect an Independent as president with no base of political support.

A couple more thoughts about Chance the Rapper. He's right that all black people don't have to be Democrats. But first we need do a better job at holding Democrats accountable after we elect them. Voting is just the first step. Next we have to organize and push for what we want.
@keithboykin Well Chance, we'll have to think about this for a minute. You were too quick with the nonsense. Chance needs to be debriefed and sent to Wakanda for the rebirth ritual!
@keithboykin Glad to see this, at least he seems to understand words have meaning.  Most time it is best to STOP AND THINK ABOUT WHAT YOU RESPOND TO AND HOW U RESPOND.
@keithboykin Oh- I see the response to his initial comments in support of Kanye weren’t taken too kindly by the majority of folks who support him. Laugh-out-Loud.
@keithboykin Actions have consequences...he knew how his tweet would come across without any context and he didn't care thus why he used Jay's gif.he hust can't take the heat....
@CourtneyMcCain @keithboykin It depends on how good is his potato salad.
@keithboykin She STILL blocked!! Too old not to know better.
@keithboykin @HuggyLowdownDC My City My City !

@CourtneyMcCain @keithboykin No! He need to put his actions where his mouth is. I'm done with them. I push my kids to support my black brothers & sisters so they can use their platform to help not throw a grenade at us.
@keithboykin Too late... https://t.co/lDsq2qC5ic
@keithboykin Ladies & gentlemen, the triggered trumpsters in... https://t.co/5XIVbjr8AQ

@keithboykin You can’t unring a bell. His name has been used by the Trump fanatics all morning to further advertise Trumps agenda to black people and he gave them his name on a silver platter by saying what he did when he said it. Too late.
@keithboykin wow--that was cleared up quick --fast --n a hurry! @amjoyshow
@keithboykin When you realize the power of black people, just when you think we're all stupid democrats. You come crawling back when you realize we employ you.
@CourtneyMcCain @keithboykin NO
@keithboykin TOO LATE
